attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is a one man petition as far as I know. I want you,Gordon Brown, not to tax OUR alternative energy. This is SCOTLANDS money not the uk's. I also demand that all oil and gas revenue stays in the country of SCOTLAND.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
